biotools.summary: A database of Chromosomal Rearrangements In Diseases (dbCRID, http://dbCRID.biolead.org) is a database of human CR events and their associated diseases. For each reported CR event, dbCRID documents the type of the event, the disease or symptoms associated, and--when possible--detailed information about the CR event including precise breakpoint positions, junction sequences, genes and gene regions disrupted and experimental techniques applied to discover/analyze the CR event.
